events.title: Email Request for FD-71 Status
events.description: An FBI Special Agent sends an email requesting the status of retrieving an FD-71 form from closed files, indicating follow-up investigative work.

keyFacts: The email is from an FBI Special Agent in the Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit (CACHTU), indicating the unit's involvement in the Epstein investigation.
The agent is following up on retrieving an FD-71 form from closed files, suggesting a review of prior records or a specific document request.
The email references an attached update document dated August 27, 2019, titled 'JeffreyEpstein_update_8.27.19.docx'.
The communication date is August 28, 2019, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019 and before his death in August 2019.
The 'DD' (likely Deputy Director or similar) had a follow-up question regarding an update, showing high-level oversight of the investigation.
